title: Ticket #2601: communication errors not correctly handled in condor_q -stream
description:
Brian noticed that assert() is redefined twice in qmgmt_send_stubs.cpp. My addition of GetAllJobsByConstraint_Next() fell in a part of the file where assert() was redefined (for the second time) to return NULL rather than -1, so the error handling in this function is broken. This could cause condor_q -stream not to detect communication errors.

I propose that redefining assert() once in a file is a misdemeanor. Redefining it twice is an outright felony.
